name.description: The domain name of the website -- e.g., `example.com` in `www.example.com`

subdomain.description: The subdomain name of the website -- e.g., `www` in `www.example.com`

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the Azure resource group containing the DNS zone

customDomain.description: The custom domain to use for CNAME records. For example, `www.example.com`.

enableHttpsTrafficOnly.description: Whether to restrict traffic to HTTPS only. Defaults to false.

isCompressionEnabled.description: The custom domain to use for CNAME records. For example, `www.example.com`.

contentTypesToCompress.description: Whether to restrict traffic to HTTPS only. Defaults to false.

sitePath.description: The root directory containing contents of the built website contents.

indexDoc.description: The default document for the site. Defaults to index.html.

errorDoc.description: The default error page for the website. Defaults to error.html.

oneOf.description: Whether to provision an Azure CDN to serve website content.

domain.description: The domain configuration of the website.

storage.description: The storage configuration of the website.

originURL.description: The direct URL of the website.

cdnURL.description: The CDN URL of the website.

cdnHostname.description: The CDN hostname of the website.

domainURL.description: The custom-domain URL of the website.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the created resource group.
